title: Ticket #3300: Merge network plugin / network accounting to master
description:
I'd like to merge https://github.com/bbockelm/condor.git, branch network_namespaces to master.

This work adds a network manager plugin and provides a sample plugin which does network namespaces. The sample plugin is in the condor_contrib/lark directory, and must be enabled explicitly.

Will attach the API design doc.
attachments: • Condor Network Integration Implementation.docx 147865 bytes added by bbockelm on 2012-Oct-30 22:32:07 UTC.
check_ins: 2013-Feb-18 17:19   Check-in [46455]: Merged [34947], [34949], [34953], [34954], [34955], [34960], [34962], Merge branch 'master' into network_namespaces Conflicts: src/condor_contrib/CMakeLists.txt src/condor_daemon_core.V6/daemon_core.cpp Work toward merging code into trunk; #3300.
